name: lerna-monorepo-release
description: Management release example for Lerna monorepos.

scripts.publish-lib-dev: lerna version -m 'feat(release): tag lib release on dev' --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease=lib --preid dev --yes
scripts.publish-app-dev: lerna version -m 'feat(release): tag app release on dev' --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease=app --preid dev --yes
scripts.publish-lib-prod: lerna version -m 'chore(release): tag lib release on prod' --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate=lib --yes
scripts.publish-app-prod: lerna version -m 'chore(release): tag app release on prod' --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate=app --yes
